content.description:
A harder, more awesome start to Triple Sec. 

  As opposed to starting on the right crimp under the steepness, and a wider sidepull, start with hands on both small crimps under the steep face. Make a huge move (useing a far right toe-hook?) to the pinch. Finish as per "Triple Sec"

A good project left undone. Could be v7 or v8. 

  Start low near the chunky bottom right corner with a high heel hook further down and right. Move up and left along the ripples and dyno far left to the juggy crack. Continue left to top out.

Look under the steepness for the two crimps. Start with your left hand on the right-most crimp edge, and your right hand on the vertical face, low on a chunky sidepull/pinch. Post on a far, low right foot for the start. 

  Fall up and into the slopey sidepull above, cut feet, and post up a high left foot on the crimp (the crimp to the left of the starting hand).  

  Hop into the upper left jug, and trend up and left to top out over little knobs (use the higher block/crack to help top out).

This cluster of boulders is a directly above the Mystery Boulder (below burning boulder, left of Direwolf).  

  These three blocks are really cool! Stacked on top of one and other, the top two blocks are the climbable ones (the lower is too small).
